Currently unable to send your message.
Your request has successfully been submitted
Your request couldn\'t be submitted, please try again
If you enjoy using %1$s, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
Help improve %1$s by completing a short customer feedback survey
Join our community and give feedback on %1$s
Decide what happens when you press the language key
No completions or corrections will be provided.
Control the look and feel of your keyboard
Program the Any Key and return key to perform your favorite action
Choose from a library of wallpaper images
Cannot load that photo. Please try another.
An error occurred while copying the photo. Please try again.
%1$s must be your default keyboard before you can apply wallpaper. Set it to default now?
Make the keyboard taller or shorter
Make the suggestions bigger or smaller
Adjust the padding around the bottom row
To preview your changes, make %1$s the default keyboard.
Automatically capitalize the first word in sentences.
Automatically add a space after selecting a suggestion, after commas, and at the end of sentences.
Double-tapping the space bar adds a period and space.
Show a list of words that predict what you are typing.
Select the default suggestion by typing a space or punctuation.
Include corrections to possible typos in the suggestion list, and automatically correct obvious typos.
Display next word predictions based on your typing history.
Include matches with names in your contact list.
If checked, the suggestion bar is always visible. If unchecked, it is displayed when necessary, and hidden when possible.
Assign an action to a swipe gesture
Swipe up/down to toggle the number row
Type words and phrases with just a few keystrokes
Another shortcut already uses the same keystrokes.
Are you sure you want to delete this shortcut?
If more than one voice match is returned, automatically select the closest one.
Submit the debug log to support.
Please do not type personal information while debug logging is enabled. It will be visible to support personnel.
The log file was successfully sent. Debug logging has been disabled.
The log is empty. Please collect data and try again.
If you have a coupon code, enter it here.
There is no dictionary to download
Make the keyboard more or less sensitive to swipes
Setting up %1$s is as easy as 1,2,3!
On the next screen, press the check box next to %1$s
Don\'t forget to press BACK after!
Good job! Now press Back to continue setup.

Good job!

On the next screen, select %1$s as your default keyboard
On the next screen, click the check box to enable %1$s.
You did not enable %1$s. You cannot use it until it is enabled. Do you want to try again?
Would you like to make it your default keyboard?
%1$s is enabled, but it is not yet the default keyboard. Press OK to continue...
On the next screen, select %1$s as your default keyboard\n
You can download your dictionary later in Settings

It\'s now easier to undo auto-corrects with the Undo Menu. When a word is auto-corrected, it will be underlined in light gray. Press the word to open a menu containing the original word, plus more suggestions.
Can\'t access your database. Please reinstall this package now.
New dictionary available. It requires app update.
No dictionary installed. Click here to download one.
A new version of your %1$s dictionary is available. Click here to download.
Voice input is not available on this device.
Can\'t make purchase item on your account
To set custom wallpaper, TypeSmart needs access to your photos.
To see contact suggestions, TypeSmart needs access to your contacts.
